timeline.message: fix: aks must define at least one system pool
feat: add sku for aks cluster

timeline.bodyText: Is agentPoolMode mandatory? If so should it be in a separate stage?
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText:
It is hard to say mandatory or not. The service requires one pool to be system and others could be default.
Do we prefer to use withSystemMode/withDefaultMode as a mandatory definition?
replies.author: ChenTanyi

replies.bodyText: Since the enum is ExpandableStringEnum so service could add new one anytime. In this case maybe just an enum would be good enough.
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: After discussing, I think adding it in the optional stage is enough. The service response is enough for customer.
replies.author: ChenTanyi

timeline.bodyText: Does this change make withAddOnProfiles unavailable on update stage?
timeline.author: xseeseesee

replies.bodyText: There is another in update stage.
replies.author: ChenTanyi
